p: Our analysis of the joint probabilities of AOD, and AE and SSA from MERRA-2 relative to AERONET, indicate good agreement, although MERRA-2 underestimates the dynamic range of AE and SSA (Figure S1). Such underestimation is common when comparing gridded aerosol datasets that represent area means (~2,500 m 2 for MERRA-2) versus in situ observations such as the pseudo-point measurements from AERONET. MERRA-2 reproduces the observed region-to-region variability in aerosol radiative properties and the MERRA-2 versus AERONET differences tend to be smaller than region-to-region differences (Figure S1).
